title: Papua New Guinea report
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Roland Beckett and John Gray
brief_description: Surveys social, political and economic development in Papua New Guinea, showing the main problems and the state of education, public health, communications and local and central government in preparation for independence.
